Title: Stonemasons and craft mobility in the Bronze Age eastern Mediterranean
Source: Hum. Mobil. and Technological Transf. in the Prehistoric Mediterranean
Abstract: © The British School at Athens 2016.This chapter considers the evidence for craft mobility and cultural learning amongst stonemasons in the Bronze Age eastern Mediterranean. It draws on a range of cross- cultural comparative evidence, as well as placing particular emphasis on case studies from Egypt and the Aegean in the 3rd and 2nd millennium bc.
